title: Schema for content type pdbx collection pdbx_ext_v5_0_2

id.description:
The value of _entry.id identifies the data block.

 Note that this item need not be a number; it can be any unique
 identifier.

entry_id.description:
This data item is a pointer to _entry.id in the 
 ENTRY category.

feature.description:
This data item identifies a secondary structure
 feature of this entry.

buckle.description: The value of the base pair buckle parameter.

hbond_type_12.description: Base pair classification of Westhoff and Leontis.

i_PDB_ins_code.description:
Describes the PDB insertion code of the i-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the
ATOM_SITE category.

i_auth_asym_id.description:
Describes the asym id of the i-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

i_auth_seq_id.description:
Describes the sequence number of the i-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_seq_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

i_label_asym_id.description:
Describes the asym id of the i-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_asym_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

i_label_comp_id.description:
Describes the component id of the i-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_comp_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

i_label_seq_id.description:
Describes the sequence number of the i-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_seq_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

i_symmetry.description:
Describes the symmetry operation that should be applied to the
 coordinates of the i-th base to generate the first partner 
 in the base pair.

j_PDB_ins_code.description:
Describes the PDB insertion code of the j-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the
ATOM_SITE category.

j_auth_asym_id.description:
Describes the asym id of the j-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

j_auth_seq_id.description:
Describes the sequence number of the j-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_seq_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

j_label_asym_id.description:
Describes the asym id of the j-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_asym_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

j_label_comp_id.description:
Describes the component id of the j-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_comp_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

j_label_seq_id.description:
Describes the sequence number of the j-th base in the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_seq_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

j_symmetry.description:
Describes the symmetry operation that should be applied to the
 coordinates of the j-th base to generate the second partner 
 in the base pair.

model_number.description:
Describes the model number of the the base pair.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_model_num in the
ATOM_SITE category.

opening.description: The value of the base pair opening parameter.

pair_name.description: Text label for this base pair.

pair_number.description: Sequential number of pair in the pair sequence.

propeller.description: The value of the base pair propeller parameter.

shear.description: The value of the base pair shear parameter.

stagger.description: The value of the base pair stagger parameter.

stretch.description: The value of the base pair stretch parameter.

helical_rise.description: The value of the base pair step helical rise parameter.

helical_twist.description: The value of the base pair step helical twist parameter.

i_PDB_ins_code_1.description:
Describes the PDB insertion code of the i-th base in the 
first base pair of the step.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in 
the ATOM_SITE category.

i_PDB_ins_code_2.description:
Describes the PDB insertion code of the i-th base in the 
second base pair of the step.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in 
the ATOM_SITE category.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

rise.description: The value of the base pair step rise parameter.

roll.description: The value of the base pair step roll parameter.

shift.description: The value of the base pair step shift parameter.

slide.description: The value of the base pair step slide parameter.

step_name.description: The text name of this step.

step_number.description: The sequence number of this step in the step sequence.

tilt.description: The value of the base pair step tilt parameter.

tip.description: The value of the base pair step twist parameter.

twist.description: The value of the base pair step twist parameter.

x_displacement.description: The value of the base pair step X displacement parameter.

y_displacement.description: The value of the base pair step Y displacement parameter.

PDB_ins_code.description:
Optional identifier of the residue

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

PDB_model_num.description:
The model number for the given residue

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_model_num in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

auth_asym_id.description:
Part of the identifier of the residue

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

Part of the identifier of the residue

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_atom_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

auth_comp_id.description:
Part of the identifier of the residue 

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_comp_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

auth_seq_id.description:

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_seq_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

details.description: A description of the outlier angle  e.g. ALPHA-CARBON

id.description:
The value of _pdbx_validate_chiral.id must 
 uniquely identify each item in the PDBX_VALIDATE_CHIRAL list.
 This is an integer serial number.

label_alt_id.description:
Part of the identifier of the residue

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_alt_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

PDB_ins_code_1.description:
Optional identifier of the first of the two atom sites that
 define the close contact.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

PDB_ins_code_2.description:
Optional identifier of the second of the two atom sites that
 define the close contact.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

PDB_model_num.description: The model number for the given contact

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the

dist.description: The value of the close contact for the two atoms defined.

id.description:
The value of _pdbx_validate_close_contact.id must uniquely identify 
 each item in the PDBX_VALIDATE_CLOSE_CONTACT list.
 This is an integer serial number.

An optional identifier of the first of the two atoms that
 define the close contact.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_alt_id in the

 ATOM_SITE category.

id.description:

 uniquely identify each item in the PDBX_VALIDATE_PEPTIDE_OMEGA list.

This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_alt_id in the
ATOM_SITE category.

omega.description:
The value of the OMEGA angle for the peptide linkage between 
 the two defined residues

angle_deviation.description:

angle_target_value.description: The target value of the bond angle

angle_value.description: The value of the bond angle

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_seq_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

id.description:
The value of _pdbx_validate_rmsd_angle.id must uniquely identify 
 each item in the PDBX_VALIDATE_RMSD_ANGLE list.
 This is an integer serial number.

label_alt_id_1.description:
An optional identifier of the first of the three atoms that
 define the covalent angle.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_alt.id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

label_alt_id_2.description:
An optional identifier of the second of the three atoms that
 define the covalent angle.

linker_flag.description: A flag to indicate if the angle is between two residues

 define the covalent bond.

 ATOM_SITE category.

Optional identifier of the second of the two atom sites that
 define the covalent bond.

 ATOM_SITE category.

PDB_model_num.description: The model number for the given bond

 ATOM_SITE category.

auth_asym_id_2.description:

 that define the covalent bond.

auth_atom_id_1.description:

auth_comp_id_2.description:

auth_seq_id_1.description:

 ATOM_SITE category.

auth_seq_id_2.description:
Part of the identifier of the second of the two atom sites
 that define the covalent bond.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_seq_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

bond_deviation.description:
The value of the deviation from ideal for the defined covalent 
 bond for the two atoms defined.

bond_standard_deviation.description: The uncertaintiy in target value of the bond length expressed as a standard deviation.

bond_target_value.description: The target value of the bond length

bond_value.description: The value of the bond length

The value of _pdbx_validate_rmsd_bond.id must uniquely identify

 ATOM_SITE category.

site_symmetry_1.description:
The symmetry of the first of the two atoms define the close contact. 
 Symmetry defined in ORTEP style of 555 equal to unit cell with translations
  +-1 from 555 as 000

site_symmetry_2.description:
The symmetry of the second of the two atoms define the close contact. 
 Symmetry defined in ORTEP style of 555 equal to unit cell with translations
  +-1 from 555 as 000

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the

phi.description:
The Phi value that for the residue that lies outside normal limits 
 (in combination with the Psi value) with regards to the rammachandran plot

psi.description:
The Psi value that for the residue that lies outside normal limits 
 (in combination with the Phi value) with regards to the rammachandran plot

id.description:
The value of _struct_conf.id must uniquely identify a record in
 the STRUCT_CONF list.

 Note that this item need not be a number; it can be any unique
 identifier.

pdbx_PDB_helix_class.description:
This item is a place holder for the helix class used in the PDB
 HELIX record.

pdbx_PDB_helix_id.description:
A placeholder for the helix identifier of the PDB
HELIX record.

pdbx_PDB_helix_length.description:
A placeholder for the lengths of the helix of the PDB
HELIX record.

pdbx_beg_PDB_ins_code.description:
A component of the identifier for the residue at which the
 conformation segment starts.

pdbx_end_PDB_ins_code.description:
A component of the identifier for the residue at which the
 conformation segment ends.

id.description:
The descriptor that categorizes the type of the conformation
 of the backbone of the polymer (whether protein or nucleic acid).
 Explicit values for the torsion angles that define each
 conformation are not given here, but it is expected that the
 author would provide such information in either the
 _struct_conf_type.criteria or _struct_conf_type.reference data
 items, or both.

conn_type_id.description:
This data item is a pointer to _struct_conn_type.id in the
 STRUCT_CONN_TYPE category.

examples: disulfide bridge C-S-S-C is highly distorted
details.description: A description of special aspects of the connection.

id.description:
The value of _struct_conn.id must uniquely identify a record in
 the STRUCT_CONN list.

 Note that this item need not be a number; it can be any unique
 identifier.

pdbx_leaving_atom_flag.description:
This data item identifies if the linkage has displaced leaving atoms
 on both, one or none of the connected atoms forming the linkage.    
 Leaving atoms are defined within their chemical defintions of each
 connected component.

pdbx_ptnr1_PDB_ins_code.description:
A component of the identifier for partner 1 of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

pdbx_ptnr1_label_alt_id.description:
A component of the identifier for partner 1 of the
structure connection. This data item is a pointer to
_atom_site.label_alt_id in the ATOM_SITE category.

pdbx_ptnr2_PDB_ins_code.description:
A component of the identifier for partner 1 of the structure
 connection.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.pdbx_PDB_ins_code in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

pdbx_ptnr2_label_alt_id.description:
A component of the identifier for partner 2 of the
structure connection. This data item is a pointer to
_atom_site.label_alt_id in the ATOM_SITE category.

pdbx_value_order.description:
The chemical bond order associated with the specified atoms in 
 this contact.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_asym_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

 ATOM_SITE category.

ptnr1_symmetry.description:
Describes the symmetry operation that should be applied to the
 atom set specified by _struct_conn.ptnr1_label* to generate the
 first partner in the structure connection.

A component of the identifier for partner 2 of the structure

 ATOM_SITE category.

 ATOM_SITE category.

 ATOM_SITE category.

ptnr2_label_atom_id.description:

Describes the symmetry operation that should be applied to the
 atom set specified by _struct_conn.ptnr2_label* to generate the

id.description: The chemical or structural type of the interaction.

The value of _struct_sheet.id must uniquely identify a record in
 the STRUCT_SHEET list.

 Note that this item need not be a number; it can be any unique
 identifier.

number_strands.description:
The number of strands in the sheet. If a given range of residues
 bulges out from the strands, it is still counted as one strand.
 If a strand is composed of two different regions of polypeptide,
 it is still counted as one strand, as long as the proper hydrogen-
 bonding connections are made to adjacent strands.

range_1_beg_auth_seq_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the residue for the first
 partner of the first hydrogen bond between two residue ranges
 in a sheet.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.auth_seq_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

range_1_beg_label_atom_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the residue for the first
 partner of the first hydrogen bond between two residue ranges
 in a sheet.

 This data item is a pointer to _atom_site.label_atom_id in the
 ATOM_SITE category.

 in a sheet.

 ATOM_SITE category.

range_1_end_auth_seq_id.description:
A component of the identifier for the residue for the first
 partner of the last hydrogen bond between two residue ranges in

 ATOM_SITE category.

 ATOM_SITE category.
